---

FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

App My Community Expands its Offerings with New Content Management Services and Welcomes New Employee

[City], [State] - App My Community, a leading provider of community management software, is pleased to announce the launch of its new content management services and welcome a new employee, Diane Frantz, to its team. Frantz, who was previously a customer of App My Community and a campground owner, will be joining the company as a community manager to help serve its growing customer base.

App My Community's new content management services will help community managers better organize and share content with their members, improving overall engagement and satisfaction. With the platform's new tools, community managers can easily upload and manage all types of content, including articles, photos, videos, and more, and organize them into categories, tags, and playlists.

"We're excited to launch our new content management services and welcome Diane to our team," said [Name], CEO of App My Community. "Diane brings a wealth of experience as a customer of our platform and a successful campground owner. Her knowledge and insight will be invaluable in helping us serve our customers even better."

In addition to its content management services, App My Community offers a range of other features to help community managers streamline their work, including member directories, event management tools, and communication tools. The platform is designed to be user-friendly and customizable, allowing community managers to tailor it to their specific needs.

Frantz, who has over 20 years of experience in the campground industry, is excited to join App My Community and help community managers build thriving communities. "As a longtime customer of App My Community, I've seen firsthand how their platform can help communities grow and thrive," she said. "I'm thrilled to be joining the team and look forward to helping even more community managers succeed."

To learn more about App My Community and its offerings, visit [website URL].

About App My Community
App My Community is a community management software company that provides innovative tools to help community managers build, engage, and grow their communities. The company's platform is designed to be user-friendly and customizable, allowing community managers to tailor it to their specific needs. With a focus on customer satisfaction and community success, App My Community is the ideal partner for community managers of all types and sizes.
